mapper.select: SELECT value FROM data_dictionary_value WHERE dictionary_code = 'ipFilterWhite'
SELECT value FROM data_dictionary_value WHERE dictionary_code = 'ipFilterBlack'
SELECT * FROM data_dictionary_value WHERE dictionary_code IN ('ipFilterWhite','ipFilterBlack') AND value = #{ip} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM data_dictionary_value WHERE dictionary_code = CONCAT('ipFilter',#{type})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO data_dictionary_value (dictionary_code, name, value, create_time) VALUES (CONCAT('ipFilter',#{type}),#{ip},#{ip},now())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM data_dictionary_value WHERE dictionary_code = CONCAT('ipFilter',#{type}) AND id = #{id} AND name <> '127.0.0.1'
